source.expression:
let
    Source = #table(type table [Dummy = text], {{ "Metrics Container" }})
in
    Source

measures.name: Net Profit Margin
measures.description: Represents the percentage of revenue that remains after all operating expenses, interest, and taxes have been deducted.

measures.name: Return on Invested Capital (ROIC)
measures.expression: DIVIDE([Net Operating Profit After Tax], [Total Debt + Total Equity])
measures.description: Measures how well a company is using its money to generate returns.

measures.name: Free Cash Flow (FCF)
measures.description: The cash a company produces through its operations after subtracting capital expenditures.

measures.name: EBITDA Margin
measures.description: Earnings before interest, taxes, depreciation, and amortization as a percentage of revenue.

measures.name: Gross Profit Margin
measures.description: The percentage of revenue remaining after direct costs of goods sold are deducted.

measures.name: Working Capital Ratio
measures.description: Measures a company's ability to meet short-term obligations with current assets.

measures.name: Employee Turnover Rate
measures.expression: DIVIDE([Number of Employees Who Left], [Average Number of Employees) * 100])
measures.description: The percentage of employees who leave a company within a certain period.

measures.name: Lost Time Injury Frequency Rate (LTIFR)
measures.expression: DIVIDE([Number of Lost-Time Injuries], [Total Hours Worked) * 1,000,000])
measures.description: The number of lost-time injuries occurring in a workplace per 1,000,000 hours worked.

measures.name: Training Hours Per Employee
measures.description: Average number of hours spent on training and development per employee per year.

measures.name: Absenteeism Rate
measures.expression: DIVIDE([Total Days Absent], [Total Available Work Days) * 100])
measures.description: The percentage of scheduled work time lost due to employee absences.

measures.name: IT System Uptime
measures.description: The percentage of time a critical IT system (e.g., ERP, ERP, SCADA) is operational and available.

measures.name: Mean Time To Repair (MTTR)
measures.description: Average time required to repair a failed system or component and restore it to operational status.

measures.name: Cybersecurity Incident Rate
measures.description: The number of confirmed security incidents per period.

measures.name: Warehouse Dwell Time (Import)
measures.description: The average time an import container resides on a marine terminal, from vessel discharge to truck gate-out.

measures.name: Dock Moves Per Hour (BMPH)
measures.expression: DIVIDE([Total Package Moves], [Transport Unit Departure Time - Transport Unit Arrival Time])
measures.description: The total number of container moves (lifts on/off a vessel) divided by the number of hours the vessel is at berth.

measures.name: Truck Turnaround Time
measures.description: The average time it takes for a truck to enter the terminal, complete its transaction (pickup/drop-off), and exit.

measures.name: On-Time Performance (Transport Unit/Flight/Truck)
measures.expression: DIVIDE([Number of On-Time Events], [Total Number of Events) * 100])
measures.description: The percentage of arrivals or departures that occur within a predefined time window of the schedule.

measures.name: Cargo Damage Rate
measures.expression: DIVIDE([Number of Damaged Units], [Total Units Handled) * 100])
measures.description: The percentage of cargo units that sustain damage during handling or storage.

measures.name: Transport Unit Turnaround Time
measures.description: Total time from when a vessel arrives at berth to when it departs.

measures.name: Fleet Utilization Rate
measures.description: The percentage of time vehicles in a fleet are actively being used for revenue-generating activities.

measures.name: Fuel Efficiency (MPG or L/100km)
measures.description: Average fuel consumption efficiency across fleet operations.

measures.name: Overall Equipment Effectiveness (OEE)
measures.description: A composite metric that measures manufacturing productivity by combining equipment availability, performance, and quality.

measures.name: Manufacturing Cycle Time
measures.description: The total time required to convert raw materials into finished goods.

measures.name: First Pass Yield (FPY)
measures.expression: DIVIDE([Units Completed without Rework], [Total Units Started) * 100])
measures.description: The percentage of products manufactured correctly to specifications the first time, without rework or scrap.

measures.name: Scrap Rate
measures.expression: DIVIDE([Weight of Scrap], [Total Weight of Materials Used) * 100])
measures.description: The percentage of raw materials or work-in-process that becomes waste during production.

measures.name: Production Capacity Utilization
measures.description: The percentage of maximum production capacity currently being utilized.

measures.name: Downtime Percentage
measures.description: The percentage of scheduled production time lost due to equipment failures or maintenance.

measures.name: Changeover Time
measures.expression: [End of Last Good Part]([Product A])[to First Good Part]([Product B])
measures.description: Time required to switch production line from one product to another.

measures.name: Maintenance Cost as % of Asset Value
measures.expression: DIVIDE([Annual Maintenance Costs], [Total Asset Replacement Value) * 100])
measures.description: Annual maintenance and repair costs expressed as percentage of total asset replacement value.

measures.name: Asset Uptime
measures.expression: DIVIDE([Scheduled Operating Time - Unscheduled Downtime], [Scheduled Operating Time) * 100])
measures.description: The percentage of time a critical piece of equipment is available and running as intended.

measures.name: Production Volume (Barrels/Day, MWh)
measures.description: The total amount of product produced over a specific period.

measures.name: Mean Time Between Failures (MTBF)
measures.description: The predicted elapsed time between inherent failures of a mechanical or electronic system during normal operation.

measures.name: Energy Intensity
measures.description: Energy consumed per unit of production output.

measures.name: Generation Reliability
measures.expression: DIVIDE([Available Hours - Forced Outage Hours], [Available Hours) * 100])
measures.description: The percentage of time a power generation asset is available to produce when needed.

measures.name: Emissions Rate (CO2/Unit)
measures.description: Amount of greenhouse gas emissions per unit of production.

measures.name: Water Usage Efficiency
measures.description: Volume of water consumed per unit of production output.

measures.name: Inventory Turnover
measures.description: Measures how many times a company's inventory is sold and replaced over a period.

measures.name: Perfect Order Rate
measures.description: The percentage of orders delivered to the right place, with the right product, at the right time, in the right condition, with the right paperwork.

measures.name: Days of Supply (DOS)
measures.expression: [Average Inventory]/([Cost of Goods Sold]/[Number of Days in Period])
measures.description: The number of days a company could operate on its current inventory.

measures.name: Order Fill Rate
measures.description: Percentage of customer orders fulfilled completely from available inventory.

measures.name: Stockout Rate
measures.description: Percentage of time a product is out of stock when customers want to purchase it.

measures.name: Cash-to-Cash Cycle Time
measures.expression: [Days Inventory Outstanding]+[Days Sales Outstanding]-[Days Payable Outstanding]
measures.description: The number of days between paying for raw materials and receiving payment from customers.

measures.name: Supplier On-Time Delivery
measures.description: Percentage of supplier deliveries that arrive within the agreed time window.

measures.name: Forecast Accuracy
measures.description: Measures how closely demand forecasts match actual sales or consumption.

measures.name: Ore Recovery Rate
measures.expression: DIVIDE([Recovered Mineral Weight], [Total Mineral in Ore) * 100])
measures.description: Percentage of valuable mineral recovered from ore during processing.

measures.name: Tons Per Operating Hour
measures.description: Average tonnage of material extracted or processed per hour of operation.

measures.name: Haul Truck Cycle Time
measures.expression: [Average]([Return to Load Point Time]-[Departure from Load Point Time])
measures.description: Average time for a haul truck to complete one full cycle (load, haul, dump, return).

measures.name: Project Schedule Performance Index (SPI)
measures.description: Measures project schedule efficiency against planned timeline.

measures.name: Construction Cost Performance Index (CPI)
measures.description: Measures project cost efficiency against budget.

measures.name: Rework Rate
measures.expression: DIVIDE([Hours Spent on Rework], [Total Project Hours) * 100])
measures.description: Percentage of work that must be redone due to defects or errors.

measures.name: Crop Yield Per Acre
measures.description: Amount of crop produced per unit of cultivated land area.

measures.name: Feed Conversion Ratio
measures.description: Amount of feed required to produce one unit of livestock product.

measures.name: Customer Satisfaction Score (CSAT)
measures.expression: DIVIDE([Number of Satisfied Customers], [Total Survey Responses) * 100])
measures.description: Percentage of customers rating their experience as satisfactory or better.

measures.name: Net Promoter Score (NPS)
measures.description: Measures customer loyalty by likelihood to recommend to others.

measures.name: First Call Resolution Rate
measures.expression: DIVIDE([Issues Resolved on First Contact], [Total Issues) * 100])
measures.description: Percentage of customer issues resolved during the first contact.

measures.name: Regulatory Compliance Rate
measures.description: Percentage of required compliance checks or audits passed without findings.

measures.name: Audit Findings Per Period
measures.description: Number of compliance or quality audit findings requiring corrective action.

measures.name: Carbon Footprint Per Product
measures.expression: DIVIDE([Total CO2 Equivalent Emissions], [Total Units Produced])
measures.description: Total greenhouse gas emissions attributable to producing one unit of product.

measures.name: Waste Diversion Rate
measures.description: Percentage of total waste diverted from landfill through recycling, composting, or reuse.

measures.name: Renewable Energy Percentage
measures.description: Percentage of total energy consumption from renewable sources.

measures.name: Warranty Claim Rate
measures.expression: DIVIDE([Number of Warranty Claims], [Total Products Sold) * 100])
measures.description: Percentage of products sold that result in warranty claims within coverage period.

measures.name: Customer Retention Rate
measures.expression: DIVIDE([Customers at End - New Customers], [Customers at Start) * 100])
measures.description: Percentage of customers who continue doing business over a defined period.

measures.name: Labor Productivity
measures.description: Output produced per labor hour worked.

measures.name: Schedule Adherence
measures.expression: DIVIDE([Tasks Completed On Schedule], [Total Planned Tasks) * 100])
measures.description: Percentage of planned tasks or shifts completed on schedule.

measures.name: Equipment Reliability Factor
measures.description: Ratio of actual productive time to planned production time for equipment.

measures.name: Quality Defect Rate
measures.description: Number of defects identified per units produced or inspected.

measures.name: Process Capability Index (Cpk)
measures.description: Statistical measure of how well a process can produce output within specification limits.

measures.name: Mean Time To Detect (MTTD)
measures.expression: DIVIDE([Sum of Detection Times], [Number of Incidents])
measures.description: Average time between when an incident occurs and when it is detected.

measures.name: Asset Utilization Rate
measures.description: Percentage of time assets are actively used for productive purposes.

measures.name: Revenue Per Employee
measures.description: Total revenue generated divided by number of employees.

measures.name: Backlog-to-Revenue Ratio
measures.description: Value of contracted but not yet executed work compared to annual revenue.

measures.name: Pipeline Integrity Index
measures.description: Composite score measuring the condition and reliability of pipeline infrastructure.
